name: Reference - Firmware Verification Trapezoid
x_kb_abstract: A trust control management method for security, operable on a computer system generates a unique Trust ID value by combining user-defined values with hardware-specific values associated with the user's computer system and storing the Trust ID value in a memory register physically associated with the hardware of the computer system.
x_kb_author: Michael J. Dyer, Jose E. Gonzalez, Albert Caballero
x_kb_reference_title: System and method for hardware-based trust control management
